thread.title_full: Diane Kruger gazes adoringly at Norman Reedus | Daily Mail Online

author: Christine Rendon For Dailymail.Com
title: Diane Kruger gazes adoringly at Norman Reedus | Daily Mail Online
text: Even with her hands full, the actress looked relaxed and in good spirits. The Walking Dead star wore his long locks down and a pair of sunglasses. Running errands: The pair, who starred in the 2015 movie Sky together, were seen unloading belongings from the trunk of a sleek sports car inside a garage Doing the heavy lifting: Reedus had his arms laden with a pile of packages He was wrapped up in a black windbreaker jacket, trousers, and slung a backpack over his shoulders as he carried a pile of packages in his arms. Diane announced her split from long-time love Joshua in July. A photo posted on social media of Rosetta Getty's annual July 4th party in Tuscany , appeared to show the actress seated next to her one-time rumored fling Norman. Simply stylish: Wearing a cream maxi skirt, black turtleneck, and ankle boots, Diane smiled as Norman handed her a white canvas grocery bag High spirits: Even with her hands full, the actress looked relaxed and in good spirits Meanwhile: In December it was reported that the actress had been spotted in a New York bar with Norman An Instagram snap shared by PR firm zoe communications shows The Walking Dead actor Norman in conversation with a blonde seated next to him. In December it was reported by the New York Daily News that the actress had been spotted 'making out' in a New York bar with Norman. A source close to Diane told DailyMail.com at the time: 'This story is completely fabricated and untrue.' Teamwork: The two starred in the 2015 drama Sky, in which Diane leaves her husband before hooking up with a cowboy stranger, played by Norman Meanwhile: Diane announced her split from long-time love Joshua in July Off they go: The pair appeared to be stepping out from the stylish car The two starred in the 2015 drama Sky, in which Diane leaves her husband before hooking up with a cowboy stranger, played by Norman. Just two weeks after the Tuscany bash, the actress confirmed her split from Joshua Jackson after ten years together. On Thursday, Diane shared a quote from poet Tyler Knott Gregson on Instagram which read, 'Romance is loving with every drop of yourself and never expecting a single drop in exchange.' 'I want steak,' she humorously captioned the snap. Quote: On Thursday, Kruger shared a quote from Tyler Knott Gregson on Instagram which read, 'Romance is loving with every drop of yourself and never expecting a single drop in exchange' Check it out! Kruger had a flannel shirt tied around her waist as she strode through New York on Thursday, glued to her phone Jean-ius! The star wore a button-up denim jacket Looking good: Kruger seemed to have opted for minimal makeup that day, showing off her natural beauty Hitting her stride: The star also ran a few errands in New York on Thursday Read more: Share or comment on this article 278
